snippet: Rick Santorum takes aim against the perceived Republican front-runner, Mitt Romney.
abstract: Rick Santorum takes aim against the perceived Republican front-runner, Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum on Friday told conservatives not to listen to those who urge pragmatism in choosing a presidential nominee, saying that to do so would lead to a "hollow victory" against President Obama in November.

headline.main: Santorum Says Pragmatism Would Lead to a 'Hollow Victory'
